text: Helena Khan (23 March 1927 – 15 March 2019) was a Bangladeshi educationist and writer. She completed her Bachelor of Arts degree from Lady Brabourne College. In her career, she had served in five different government schools. Helena Khan (fourth from the right) among other students in front of the Lady Brabourne College (1948) ==Awards== * Nurunnesa Khatun Bidyabinodini Literary Award (1976) * Bangladesh Shishu Academy Purashkar (2001) * Bangla Academy Literary Award (2008) * Ekushey Padak (2010) ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:1927 births Category:Bangladeshi women writers Category:Bengali-language writers Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:Recipients of Bangla Academy Award Category:Place of birth missing Category:Lady Brabourne College alumni Category:Bangladeshi women academics
title: Helena Khan
